title: Place Your Bets - Let's Play Draw Poker
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Place Your Bets - Let's Play Draw Poker
posts.post_content:
Offered tonight most would consider less than a pat hand, however I would be willing to part with it as a 5 card lot.  Otherwise draw the cards you want and place your bet.

Your "bet" must include funds net to me and shipping is included.  That's the deal and here's the deal:

Turkey Mike Donlin 
Fielding pose 
SGC 35                    
Bet = $42


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/37439/donlin-fielding[/IMG]

George Bell 
Hands over head pose 
SGC 60                 
Bet = $OLD


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10024/bell-hands-over-head[/IMG]

Demmitt 
NY version 
BVG 3                
Bet = $37

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/47874/demmitt-ny[/IMG]

Steinfeldt 
Portrait pose     
SGC 30

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10317/steinfeldt-portrait[/IMG]

Hofman 
Solly, not Danny
SGC 40        
Bet = $38

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10257/hofman[/IMG]



The gaming room is now open.;)

Tony,

Not really a game.  

Underbets will be considered.

Fullbets secure the card, if negotiations pending from another party.

Overbets are more than welcome.:D

The best answer to your question:

“the game is over when no cards remain”

As in all games of draw poker, there is a dealer, yours truly.;)
